channel.title: Clan Discussions
channel.description:
[b]Clan Discussions.[/b]
Hey. Welcome. I was just browsing through this board and I decided to post this because something popped up in my mind. One of the 1st clans I joined was totally retarded, we were preparing for a PKing trip. When I went up to Edgeville (The meeting place), they were all wearing rubbish items. Such as Wooden Sheilds, Mithril scimitars and such. I had my DDS equiped, Rune armor, Berserker, etc. The leader said to me "Wtf it is too dangerous to go up with DDS go get a Mith scim" and, from that point, the clan broke up. Everyone just left the guy standing there. After that I never joined any clans, wasn't something I was intrested in.
So, that's my story. Tell us yours. If you don't have a story, then just express your opinion for clans. :)

item.title: Clan Discussions
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:11, topic:108956”]well the first clan i joined was pretty good… we were going on a pk trip use stuff p2p pking i was ancienting useing ice burst at the time… anyways we decided to go deep so we are in 40 wild or so heading to greater when this 100 came up (the other clans leader) well we k0ed him in 10 seconds… well 5 seconds after he died there was a wave of about 50-60 people attking use (only about 10 of us) i anciented and got about 2k exp off of one hit lol then i died about 2 seconds after i cast the first spell. in about 5 min we all were in lumby… we ended up going to fight pits after words lol[/quote]well what lvl are u on rs2

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Discussions
item.dc:creator: @llib llib
item.description:
@llib wrote:

Egh…I never joined any clans :rolleyes:…I really wasn’t in to that. Actually I really didn’t like to pk much…seemed to have pretty rotten luck at it. I WAS in a Kalphite Clan of about 3 people, 4 at some points…thats about closest I’ve ever come to being in a “clan”. We made I think 34 or something trips with no chain and then it kinda fell apart…heh.

SKILLER FTW

Read full topic

item.title: Clan Discussions
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

First clan i joined just like stood there for a few minutes and i never saw them again LOL. i tryed creating a clan once but it kinda just went wrong (With pookey). A clan needs a good, dedicated leader, and a few other dedicated people to make it work, if you don’t put in the effort it will never ever work.

Read full topic
